thought: Slack action requires all parameters to be explicitly set, including the message text parameter, which must not be empty. The current Slack action parameters are empty, causing workflow execution failure. I will set all required Slack parameters properly, including dynamic text from input data, and test again.
plan: Set Slack action parameters: select channel, channelId with mode 'name' and value 'general', messageType as 'text'.
Set 'text' parameter to empty string as it will be overridden by input data text field.
Test Slack message sending with correct parameters.
criticism: Slack action parameters are incomplete; the 'text' parameter is required and must be set even if overridden by input data.

tool_input.comments: Set Slack message parameters correctly to send messages to #general channel, with text overridden by input data.
